DEPARTMENTS OF NURSING UNDER ACCREDITATION PROCESS
The following institutions have been visited on advisory capacity by the Nursing and
Midwifery Council of Nigeria and were granted permission to admit based on their available
resources annually pending accreditation by the Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria.
The institutions and their admission quota are indicated below:
